name: HOLES (Sashbros Studios)
description:
WebGL Version Link:  https://sashbros.itch.io/holes-web

Play the game and share the time taken by you to complete the game!!!!

More than 600 seconds is not good for your gaming career!! XD

Theme Music - Harry Potter - Hedwig's Theme - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kr-rnZIoMkU

Controls:

A-D: Left-Right

SPACE: Jump

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: SHOOT

Right Click: Throw Hook (Grab with ROPE)
